channel.title: Ftw!?
channel.description: What the hell is with some of these mods randomly locking posts because idiots can't stop flaming it??? They are just screwing with the guy that the post and actually did the right thing. Mopar should make something so that they can ban certain people from certain topics, so the people that did the right thing arn't dealing with all the bullshit.

item.title: Ftw!?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

  1. The moderators don’t have the time to check through the whole thread to see if the content is worth keeping unlocked.
    This is a rather large community and we have very limited staff activity.

  2. When a thread begins to stray from the original topic, it’s very hard for it to return to it’s original subject.
    People always have an opinion on everything and tend to reply to the ones who do go off topic.

item.title: Ftw!?
item.dc:creator: @Daikenkai Daikenkai
item.description:
@Daikenkai wrote:

I don’t mean to seem rude, but seriously, why would the mods lock someone elses topic if they are doing the right thing? But the mods go off at you for double posting, when they are the ones that lock a help topic before you can even get help. They should make a thingy so that mods can ban a user from a certain topic, it would save so much hassle, don’t you agree?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2009, 12:18:43 am[/size][hr]And I do really respect the mods. I just felt like raging about some crap that began to make me angry. That “make a thing so you can ban users from certain topics” was more of a suggestion.

^.^
